committees.subcommittee: Subcommittee on Risk Management, Research and Specialty Crops
Subcommittee on General Farm Commodities, Resource Conservation and Credit

official_title: To ensure that crop losses resulting from plant viruses and other plant diseases are covered by crop insurance and the noninsured crop assistance program and that agricultural producers who suffer such losses are eligible for emergency loans.

summary.text: Amends the Federal Crop Insurance Act, the Federal Agriculture Improvement Reform Act of 1996, and the Consolidated Farm and Rural Development Act to provide coverage for plant disease-caused losses under the crop insurance, noninsured crop assistance, and emergency disaster loan programs.

titles.title: To ensure that crop losses resulting from plant viruses and other plant diseases are covered by crop insurance and the noninsured crop assistance program and that agricultural producers who suffer such losses are eligible for emergency loans.
